吟.definition: to chant; to recite; verse; song (often used in titles of classical poems); (literary) to lament; to groan; (bound form) (in poetry) the cry of certain animals and insects; (music) rapid vibrato (technique for playing the guqin 古琴[gu3qin2]) (cf. 猱[nao2], wide vibrato)

吟哦.definition: to chant; to recite rhythmically; to polish verse

吟誦.definition: to read aloud; to recite rhythmically; to chant; to intone (esp. poems in rhythm)

吟風弄月.definition: lit. singing of the wind and the moon; fig. vacuous and sentimental (of poetry or art)
